segments.text: Could we go over some things , because I think my test score is wrong .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What do you think is wrong , the math or the way your answer was scored ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I am willing to take a second look because teachers make mistakes , too . Will that work for you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Check your answers against the ones on the answer sheet and let me know where you see the mistake .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , I agree ; let's move on to the calculating of the score . Would that be OK ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: We add all of these up and divide by this and that gives us this percentage .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Anytime you have a question , please feel free to ask !
segments.speaker: S2
